alert.note: Alert for Northumberland; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SCHUYLKILL AND SOUTHEASTERN NORTHUMBERLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Muir, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Pottsville, Minersville, Ashland, Pine Grove, Tremont, Lavelle, Marlin, Forrestville, Branchdale, Seltzer, Donaldson, Heckscherville, Locustdale, Buck Run, Beurys Lake, Hegins, Gordon, Ravine, Muir and Orwin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
